meanings.definition: An unfortunate incident that happens unexpectedly and unintentionally, typically resulting in harm or damage.
meanings.sent1: Accidents can happen when you least expect them.
meanings.sent2: The car crash was a terrible accident.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy puppy caused a series of accidents in the living room.
meanings.sent4: Her heartbreak was like a string of accidents, each one more painful than the last.
meanings.sent5: The sound of glass shattering echoed through the house, a reminder of the accidents that can occur.

meanings.definition: An event that is not planned or intended.
meanings.sent1: We witnessed an accident on the highway yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The surprise party was a happy accident.
meanings.sent3: The mix-up at the bakery turned out to be a fortunate accident.
meanings.sent4: Their meeting was an unexpected accident that changed their lives forever.
meanings.sent5: The unplanned adventure turned into a beautiful accident of fate.

meanings.sent1: Spilling coffee on her white shirt was an unfortunate accident.
meanings.sent2: The lost keys were a minor accident in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent3: His failed attempt at cooking dinner was a comical accident.
meanings.sent4: The broken vase was a visible accident of the chaos in the room.
meanings.sent5: The rain on her wedding day felt like a cruel accident of nature.
